n_pax_ref: Reference number of passenger for design

n_pax_front: Number of front seats in economic class (function)
n_aisle: Number of aisle in economic class (function)
m_pax_nominal: Reference mass allowance per passenger for design (function)
m_pax_max: Maximum mass allowance per passenger for design (function)
m_pax_cabin: Mean passenger mass in the cabin including its hand luggage

forward_ratio: Distance between fuselage nose and forward cabin wall over fuselage diameter
nose_cone_ratio: Fuselage nose cone length (evolutive part) over fuselage diameter
tail_cone_ratio: Fuselage tail cone length (evolutive part) over fuselage diameter
rear_bulkhead_ratio: Distance from rear pressure bulkhead to fuselage cone end over fuselage diameter

sweep25: Wing sweep angle at 25% of the chords of outboard trapezoid (function)
front_spar_ratio: Relative chord position of front spar
rear_spar_ratio: Relative chord position of rear spar
hld_type: Type of high lift device, from 0 to 10, (function)

sweep25: Vertical tail sweep angle at 25% of the chords (function)
toc: Thickness to chord ratio of the vertical tail
thrust_volume_factor: Volume coefficient of the vertical stabilizer according to engine failure
wing_volume_factor: Volume coefficient of the vertical stabilizer according to wing
anchor_ratio: Relative position of the reference point of the stabilization surface

sweep25: Vertical tail sweep angle at 25% of the chords (function)
toc: Thickness to chord ratio of the vertical tail
thrust_volume_factor: Volume coefficient of the vertical stabilizer according to engine failure
wing_volume_factor: Volume coefficient of the vertical stabilizer according to wing
anchor_ratio: Relative position of the reference point of the stabilization surface

sweep25: Vertical tail sweep angle at 25% of the chords (function)
toc: Thickness to chord ratio of the vertical tail
thrust_volume_factor: Volume coefficient of the vertical stabilizer according to engine failure
wing_volume_factor: Volume coefficient of the vertical stabilizer according to wing

sweep25: Horizontal tail sweep angle at 25% of the chords (function)
toc: Thickness to chord ratio of the Horizontal tail
dihedral: Dihedral angle of the horizontal tail
volume_factor: Volume coefficient of the vertical stabilizer according to engine failure

height_ratio: Horizontal tail height ratio versus vertical tail height
sweep25: Horizontal tail sweep angle at 25% of the chords (function)
toc: Thickness to chord ratio of the Horizontal tail
dihedral: Dihedral angle of the horizontal tail
volume_factor: Volume coefficient of the vertical stabilizer according to engine failure

sweep25: Horizontal tail sweep angle at 25% of the chords (function)
toc: Thickness to chord ratio of the Horizontal tail
dihedral: Dihedral angle of the horizontal tail
volume_factor: Volume coefficient of the vertical stabilizer according to engine failure

fuel_pressure: Maximum over pressure of the fuel in the tank (function)

width_rear_factor: Diameter of the rear pressure bulkhead over fuselage diameter
fuel_pressure: Maximum over pressure of the fuel in the tank (function)

structure_shell_surface_mass: Surface mass of the surrounding support structure

span_ratio: Relative span wise position of the tank
x_loc_ratio: Fraction of the tank length before the wing
z_loc_ratio: Fraction of the tank diameter between the wing and the tank
dry_bay_length: Length of an eventual dry bay
fuel_pressure: Maximum over pressure of the fuel in the tank (function)

x_loc_ratio: Fraction of the tank length behind the wing
z_loc_ratio: Fraction of the tank diameter between the fuselage and the tank axis
dry_bay_length: Length of an eventual dry bay
fuel_pressure: Maximum over pressure of the fuel in the tank (function)

wheel_drag_area_factor: Drag area over (dynamic pressure x frontal area

sfc_correction: Factor on specific fuel consumption (fuel only)

cooling_efficiency: Cooling efficiency, ex: 0.99 means that 1% of the power is used by cooling system

compressor_over_pressure: Total air pressure at fuel cell entry
compressor_efficiency: Compressor efficiency, power delivered to the air flow over input power
cooling_power_index: Cooling efficiency, ex: 0.01 means that the required power to cool the system is 1% of the dissipated power
cooling_gravimetric_index: Cooling power density, the ratio of the dissipated power over the required system mass to dissipate it

chain_power_pod: Electric shaft power of the wing tank tail electric fan
chain_power_body: Electric shaft power of the main body tail electric fan
chain_power_piggyback: Electric shaft power of piggyback body tail electric fan
lto_power: Battery power reserve for take off and landing
lto_time: Duration of availability of the power reserve
cooling_efficiency: Cooling efficiency, ex: 0.99 means that 1% of the power is used by cooling system

lateral_margin: Lateral margin as a fraction of nacelle width
vertical_margin: vertical margin as a fraction of nacelle width
engine_bpr: Reference By Pass Ratio of the engine (function)
engine_opr: Reference Overall Pressure Ratio of the engine
core_thrust_ratio: Reference ratio of the total thrust delivered by the core

vertical_margin: vertical margin as a fraction of nacelle width

engine_fpr: Reference Fan Pressure Ratio of the engine

engine_fpr: Reference Fan Pressure Ratio of the engine
engine_lpc_pr: Reference Low Pressure Compressor Ratio of the engine
engine_hpc_pr: Reference High  Pressure Compressor Ratio of the engine

vertical_margin: vertical margin as a fraction of nacelle width

bli_effect: Taking into account boundary layer ingestion, 'yes' or 'no'
lateral_margin: Lateral margin as a fraction of nacelle width
x_loc_ratio: Fraction of the tank length behind the wing
z_loc_ratio: Fraction of the tank diameter under the wing
specific_nacelle_cost: Specific maintenance cost per trip for tail cone mounted nacelle

bli_effect: Taking into account boundary layer ingestion, 'yes' or 'no'

bli_effect: Taking into account boundary layer ingestion, 'yes' or 'no'
tail_cone_height_ratio: Relative vertical position of the body tail cone

ktow: Ratio of TOW defining the aircraft weight for mission breguet range

holding_time: Holding duration for reserve fuel evaluation
reserve_fuel_ratio: Fraction of mission fuel for reserve fuel evaluation (function)
diversion_range: Range of diversion mission for reserve fuel evaluation (function)

holding_time: Holding duration for reserve fuel evaluation
reserve_enrg_ratio: Fraction of mission fuel for reserve fuel evaluation (function)
diversion_range: Range of diversion mission for reserve fuel evaluation (function)

max_fuel_range_factor: Ratio max_fuel_mission_range / nominal_mission_range, used only with mda_plus
max_body_aspect_ratio: Ratio body length / body height, maximum ratio comming from A340-600

cruise_lodmax: Assumption on L/D max for some initializations
hld_conf_clean: High lift device setting for clean wing, must be 0.
hld_conf_to: High lift device setting for take off, between 0. and 0.5
hld_conf_ld: High lift device setting for landing, typically 1. for full deflection

disa: Temperature shift for take off evaluation
kmtow: no_dim
Ratio of MTOW defining the aircraft weight
kvs1g: Ratio of MTOW defining the aircraft weight
s2_min_path: Minimum trajectory slope at 35ft for take off (function)
tofl_req: Maximum take off field length required in given conditions (function)

disa: Temperature shift for approach speed evaluation
kmlw: Ratio of MLW defining the aircraft weight
kvs1g: Ratio of MTOW defining the aircraft weight
app_speed_req: Maximum approach speed required in given conditions (function)

disa: Temperature shift for one engine performance evaluation
altp: Altitude for one engine performance evaluation (function)

Ratio of MTOW defining the aircraft weight
rating: Engine rating for one engine performance evaluation
speed_mode: Speed mode for one engine performance evaluation, 'cas':constant CAS or 'mach':constant Mach
path_req: Minimum trajectory slope required in given conditions (function)

mach: Speed defined by a Mach number (function)

mass_analysis_order: Gives the component order to perform the mass analysis

frame_origin: m
Position of the reference point of the component in the assembly
cg: m
Position of the center of gravity of the component in the assembly
inertia_tensor: kg.m2
Inertia tensor of the component in its reference point
gross_wet_area: m2
Gross wetted area of the component
net_wet_area: m2
Net wetted area of the component
aero_length: m
Characteristic length of the component for friction drag estimation
form_factor: no_dim
Form factor of the conponent for form and friction drag estimation
n_pax_ref: Reference number of passenger for design
n_pax_front: Number of front seats in economy class
n_aisle: Number of aisle in economy class
width: Tank front diameter for rear fuselage tank
co2_metric_area: Refernce cabin area for Fuel Efficiency Metric estimation
m_pax_nominal: Reference mass allowance per passenger for design
m_pax_max: Maximum mass allowance per passenger for design
m_pax_cabin: Reference mass allowance per passenger inside the cabin, passenger + hand luggage
cg_furnishing: Position of the CG of furnishing in the assembly
cg_op_item: Position of the CG of operator items in the assembly
pax_max_fwd_cg: Maximum forward position of the passengers
pax_max_fwd_mass: Mass corresponding to maximum forward position of the passengers
pax_max_bwd_cg: Maximum backward position of the passengers
pax_max_bwd_mass: Mass corresponding to maximum backward position of the passengers
projected_area: Cabin efficiency parameter ~ cabin length times fuselage width

engine_fpr: Reference Fan Pressure Ratio of the engine
core_thrust_ratio: Reference ratio of the total thrust delivered by the core
fan_efficiency: Fan efficiency, Kinetic power delivered to the air flow devided by shaft power
lateral_margin: Lateral margin as a fraction of nacelle width
vertical_margin: vertical margin as a fraction of nacelle width

nei: Number of engine inoperative, typically 0 or 1
kfn_opt: Ratio required thrust over effective engine thrust
T41: Temperature just after combustion chamber (turbine entry)

nei: Number of engine inoperative, typically 0 or 1

nei: Number of engine inoperative, typically 0 or 1
kfn_opt: Ratio required thrust over effective engine thrust
T41: Temperature just after combustion chamber (turbine entry)

reference_thrust: Engine reference thrust, thrust(sea level, ISA+15, Mach 0.25)/0.8
sfc_type: Type of Specific Fuel Consumption, 'thrust' or 'power'

kcx_correction: Factor on airplane total drag coefficient
dcx_correction: Additive correction on airplane total drag coefficient
cruise_lodmax: Maximum lift over Drag ratio in cruise
cz_cruise_lodmax: Lift coefficient for maximum lift over Drag ratio in cruise
hld_conf_clean: Deflection parameter corresponding to high lift devices retracted, typically 0
czmax_conf_clean: Maximum lift coefficient with high lift devices retracted
hld_conf_to: Deflection parameter corresponding to high lift devices in take off configuration
czmax_conf_to: Maximum lift coefficient with high lift devices in take off configuration
hld_conf_ld: Deflection parameter corresponding to high lift devices in landing configuration, typically 1
czmax_conf_ld: Maximum lift coefficient with high lift devices in landing configuration

owe_cg: Center of gravity at Operational Weight Empty

static_stab_margin: Minimal static margin in CMA ratio
forward_cg_mass: Total mass corresponding to required max forward CG
forward_cg_stall: Allowable max forward CG position according to stall demonstration
backward_cg_mass: Total mass corresponding to required max backward CG
backward_cg_stab: Allowable max backward CG position according to static stability
backward_cg_oei_trim: Allowable max backward CG position according to oei lateral trim demonstration
backward_cg_oei_mass: Total mass corresponding to oei lateral trim demonstration

holding_time: Holding duration for reserve fuel evaluation
reserve_fuel_ratio: Fraction of mission fuel for reserve fuel evaluation
diversion_range: Range of diversion mission for reserve fuel evaluation

ktow: Ratio of TOW defining the aircraft weight for mission breguet range
crz_sar: Cruise specific air range related to fuel
crz_wing_aoa: Cruise wing angle of attack, pitch angle as well
crz_fuselage_aoa: Cruise fuselage angle of attack, pitch angle as well
crz_propulsive_power: Total cruise propulsive power, total_thrust * true_air_speed
crz_tsfc: Cruise specific fuel consumption versus thrust
max_sar_cz: Lift coefficient for maximum specific air range
max_sar_lod: Lift to drag ratio for maximum specific air range
max_sar_thrust: Total thrust for maximum specific air range
max_sar_throttle: Throttle versus MCR for maximum specific air range
max_sar_tsfc: Specific fuel consumption versus thrust for maximum specific air range
max_sar_tas: True air speed at specific air range

kmtow: no_dim
Ratio of MTOW defining the aircraft weight
kvs1g: Applicable ratio of stalling speed at 1g
s2_min_path: Minimum trajectory slope at 35ft for take off
tofl_req: Maximum take off field length required in given conditions
tofl_eff: Effective take off field length in given conditions
hld_conf: Current deflection parameter corresponding to high lift devices configuration
kvs1g_eff: Effective ratio of stalling speed at 1g
v2: Airplane speed in CAS at 35ft during take off
mach2: Airplane speed in Mach number at 35ft during take off
s2_path: Airplane trajectory slope at 35ft during take off
limit: Active limit during take off, can be 'fl':field length, 's2':second segment path

kmlw: Ratio of MLW defining the aircraft weight
kvs1g: Applicable ratio of stalling speed at 1g
app_speed_req: Maximum approach speed required in given conditions
app_speed_eff: Effective approach speed in given conditions
hld_conf: Current deflection parameter corresponding to high lift devices configuration

Ratio of MTOW defining the aircraft weight
vz_req: Minimum vertical speed required in given conditions
vz_eff: Effective vertical speed in given conditions

vz_eff: Effective vertical speed in given conditions

path_req: Minimum trajectory slope required in given conditions
path_eff: Effective trajectory slope in given conditions
mach_opt: Optimal Mach number according to requirement

Ratio of MTOW defining the aircraft weight
cas1: Calibrated Air Speed below altp1 during climb trajectory
altp1: Starting pressure altitude for climb trajectory, typically 1500ft
altp2: Transtion pressure altitude from cas1 to cas2, typically 10000ft
ttc_req: Maximum time to climb required in given conditions
ttc_eff: Effective time to climb in given conditions

CO2_index: Mass of carbon dioxide emitted per kg of fuel
H2O_index: Mass of water emitted per kg of fuel
SO2_index: Mass of sulfur dioxide emitted per kg of fuel
NOx_index: Mass of nitrogen oxide emitted per kg of fuel
CO_index: Mass of carbon monoxide emitted per kg of fuel
HC_index: Mass of unburnt hydrocarbon emitted per kg of fuel
sulfuric_acid_index: Mass of sulfuric acid emitted per kg of fuel
nitrous_acid_index: Mass of nitrous acid emitted per kg of fuel
nitric_acid_index: Mass of nitric acid emitted per kg of fuel
soot_index: Number of soot particles emitted per kg of fuel
